meanings: a lot of, lots of, plenty of, a great[good] deal of, (수가) many, a large number of, a host of, (informal) a good many, (양이) much
(속담) Many hands make light work. or Many a little makes a mickle.
(속담) Too many cooks spoil the broth.
(속담) Too many cooks spoil the broth.

meanings.meaning: too many cooks spoil the broth
Too many cooks spoil the stew[broth].

vlive.korean: 근데 엄청 많으면 어떡해? What if there are too many fans wearing the same costumes? 듣기 View video TWICE : 1시간전...
vlive.english: What if there are too many fans wearing the same costumes?

vlive.korean: 근데 원래 먹방은 이렇게 말이 많으면 안 되는데 그렇죠? I'm not supposed to speak much, aren't I? 듣기 View video Stray Kids : 현진이랑 저녁 먹을래요??
vlive.english: I'm not supposed to speak much, aren't I?

vlive.korean: [Q.] 지금까지 나온 MMMTV 보다 양이 많으면 어떡해요? [Q.] What if it exceeded the videos that we have uploaded so far? 듣기 View video MAMAMOO : [MMMTV5] EP10 LET'S GO DAEGU part.4
vlive.english: [Q.] What if it exceeded the videos that we have uploaded so far?

vlive.korean: 뱃사공이 많으면... [배가 빠르게 감] - 열렸어! 열렸어! 열렸어! [So we can cook the broth fast] - We have many cooks. -I t's open! It's open! 듣기 View video SEVENTEEN : [SEVENTEEN] GOING SEVENTEEN 2019 EP.17 노래방탈출 #1 (Escape Singing Room #1)
vlive.english: [So we can cook the broth fast] - We have many cooks. -I t's open! It's open!

vlive.korean: 말이 많으면 편집하기가 힘드네... It's hard to edit if you talk too much. 듣기 View video ASTRO : [ASTRO PLAY] 열정맨 윤사원🐣
vlive.english: It's hard to edit if you talk too much.
